---
category: news
title: "UTSA builds personal AI for teaching kids living on autistic spectrum"
excerpt: "UTSA has established a wearables and artificial intelligence laboratory to provide precision treatment plans to improve learning among those diagnosed with autism spectrum disorder (ASD). Researchers will automate data collection and analysis of behavioral sensing data that can be used as an AI-augmented treatment specializer."
